title: For Sale: Wild Bill "Freaky" Donovan Portrait EPDG PSA 5
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: For Sale: Wild Bill "Freaky" Donovan Portrait EPDG PSA 5
posts.post_content: Fantastic card on two levels. Extremely tough front/back combo, and a really freaky card on top of that! Donovan almost looks like Count Dracula, 4 eyes and wild color and registration errors! Neat card....This card has sold twice for considerably higher prices than what's available here....$575 delivered...
